items.text_for_match: 'Man City make ominous statement in brutal lesson for Liverpool' Manchester City deliver an ominous statement of intent by outclassing Liverpool in Pep Guardiola's 1,000th match as a manager, says Phil McNulty. Manchester City deliver an ominous statement of intent by outclassing Liverpool in Pep Guardiola's 1,000th match as a manager, says Phil McNulty.

items.ja: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace
items.en: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace
items.text_for_match: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace Rivals Crystal Palace and Brighton settle for a point apiece from a largely dour Premier League tussle at Selhurst Park, where VAR intervention quashed a penalty award to the Seagulls. Rivals Crystal Palace and Brighton settle for a point apiece from a largely dour Premier League tussle at Selhurst Park, where VAR intervention quashed a penalty award to the Seagulls.

items.ja: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win
items.en: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win
items.text_for_match: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win Nottingham Forest come from behind to beat relegation rivals Leeds United and earn their first Premier League win under manager Sean Dyche. Nottingham Forest come from behind to beat relegation rivals Leeds United and earn their first Premier League win under manager Sean Dyche.

items.ja: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle
items.en: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle
items.text_for_match: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle Two goals from Igor Thiago helps Brentford come from behind to earn a 3-1 win over Newcastle United at the GTech Community Stadium in the Premier League. Two goals from Igor Thiago helps Brentford come from behind to earn a 3-1 win over Newcastle United at the GTech Community Stadium in the Premier League.

items.ja: Liverpool 'completely dominated' by Man City in first half - Slot
items.en: Liverpool 'completely dominated' by Man City in first half - Slot
items.text_for_match: Liverpool 'completely dominated' by Man City in first half - Slot Liverpool boss Arne Slot says their 3-0 loss to Manchester City was a fair reflection of a first half "completely dominated" by Pep Guardiola's side. Liverpool boss Arne Slot says their 3-0 loss to Manchester City was a fair reflection of a first half "completely dominated" by Pep Guardiola's side.

items.ja: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game
items.en: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game
items.text_for_match: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game Pep Guardiola believes "the universe dictated" that his 1,000th game as a manager had to be against Liverpool, as the Spaniard savoured a 3-0 win on his landmark day in the dugout. Pep Guardiola believes "the universe dictated" that his 1,000th game as a manager had to be against Liverpool, as the Spaniard savoured a 3-0 win on his landmark day in the dugout.

items.ja: Whatever could go wrong, did go wrong - Howe
items.en: Whatever could go wrong, did go wrong - Howe
items.text_for_match: Whatever could go wrong, did go wrong - Howe Eddie Howe says that his side are "suffering" in the Premier League despite recent Champions League success after they fell to a 3-1 defeat away at Brentford. Eddie Howe says that his side are "suffering" in the Premier League despite recent Champions League success after they fell to a 3-1 defeat away at Brentford.

items.ja: Villa's 'focus' key to victory - Emery
items.en: Villa's 'focus' key to victory - Emery
items.text_for_match: Villa's 'focus' key to victory - Emery Aston Villa boss Unai Emery says his players' focus was the key to their 4-0 victory over Bournemouth. Aston Villa boss Unai Emery says his players' focus was the key to their 4-0 victory over Bournemouth.
